website_summaries.verdict: It's a budget-friendly appliance with few fancy features. If you like hand-held can openers, this is a wonderful choice.
pros: A basic model that is easy to use and sits comfortably in the hand
cons: Not as durable or versatile as some other choices

customer_reviews.title: Leaves NO sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: I really like this can opener which has opened every can I've tried it on, including those rectangular Spam cans. I had another similar opener which touted the fact that the lid had no sharp edges. It left the rolled edge of the can attached to the lid, but the CAN had remaining sharp edges! This one actually splits the rolled edge somehow so that neither the lid nor the can have those sharp edges. And it's easy to use - just position it on top of the can, push the button and it winds around the can and separates the lid. And no worries that the can is too tall to fit the counter-top electric opener.
customer_reviews.author: BookieMD

customer_reviews.title: F4 Tornado  Can Opener -"New and Improved"-
customer_reviews.text: This "New and Improved" failed to open 35 ounce tomato cans. The opener revolved around the can three times without piercing the can. Performance on smaller cans is poor. It took three revolutions to open smaller cans. The opener is annoyingly noisy and it can't be manually stopped after it opens a smaller can after one revolution. We have been using an older Tornado opener (CE1213) for about five years. It opens all size cans, is not noisy, and its performance is superior to the "new and improved"model. I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa,NY

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Tornado that had the 4 batteries in it. Loved, loved, loved that one but like all products it died. Held a burial ceremony and sent it on its way. Bought the NEW F4 one and it worked ok, but was not up to the high standards of the first one I bought. This one won't always start correctly. It starts, but then immediately jumps off track and stops. Or it goes around but misses some of the can to cut and has to go around again. It is a pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Easy for older people.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone for Christmas who had an operation on her arm. I have one and like it very much. It is very easy to use. I think it would be perfect for someone with problems with their hands. I don't know about durability but I have had mine for a year and have only had to replace the battery one time.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on larger cans.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it it went all the way around and I thought it did NOT open the can but discovered that it was open. It opens the can from the side, not the top like you are expecting. Loved it for a while until I tried to open a little bit bigger can. Does not work on anything bigger than a regular dog food can so if that’s all you need it works great.
customer_reviews.author: LynniePie2

customer_reviews.title: Slow, loud, and in the garbage
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. I had gotten a can opener similar to this before and loved it. Due to nerve pain, I have lost considerable grip strength in my hands, so using a traditional opener is difficult for me. My husband likes the countertop can openers, but I can never seem to get them to work. This one does not get into position easily and several attempts are needed to get it to sit just right. Then it’s slow. Painfully slow. Like watching paint dry. And it’s loud. It is definitely not worth purchasing for any reason. I tried it several times then just tossed it in the trash out of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Krishelle

customer_reviews.title: Piece of JUNK
customer_reviews.text: We used it once and tried to use it the second time and it would not turn on. Since it isn’t something we use every day the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: cfc928

customer_reviews.title: Maiden Voyage...
customer_reviews.text: 1st time taking this lovely canopener for a spin worked spectacularly. I was warned by a dear friend (who had recommended this) that there might be a learning curve. Nothing could be farther from the truth. Highly recommend this handy dandy implement. Excellent product and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Babette

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: Quit working just goes round and round the can but doesn’t cut it. Had to purchase another brand
customer_reviews.author: kim U

customer_reviews.title: WORKED A FEW TIMES- NOW BROKEN AND TOO LATE TO RETURN
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I first bought it and even bought one for my second kitchen. They BOTH stopped working within a couple months .... DO NOT BUY. I'm stuck with wasting money on both ...
customer_reviews.author: Karen North

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT with no sharp edges!
customer_reviews.text: I've used can openers that claim they leave no sharp edges before... this one actually means it!!! This thing is super easy to use, and fun! The lid pops right off, no rough edges. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: YogaFoodieFitness

customer_reviews.title: Find a different brand
customer_reviews.text: So-so. We had an earlier version of the Tornado which worked amazingly until a battery exploded. We purchased this new one which somehow came broken. We wrote to the manufacturer who responded promptly with an exchange. Sadly the second one also is broken, still barely usable. Not sure what happened to the quality of these openers. It's too bad because it's a fantastic invention.
customer_reviews.author: SLQ

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought one, it broke after 3 cans. I received a replacement and it broke too, so I just got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Melesita

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY... Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY... Does not work! Have a 4 year old Tornado 1, and even being dull works better than this piece of crap (Tornado 4)... Couldn't open a simple can of tuna, nor soup!
customer_reviews.author: TEDDY B.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work good
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product, very hard to get it to grab the can you are trying to open. Takes several times to get it to grab the can as well as having to help it to get the right angle to grab the can. Would never recommend this product to any one, a hand can opener works much better and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a gimmickie product but wow was I wrong!! this is so awesome... It's a solid build & it absolutely does what it's supposed to! :) Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: EBU

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Way to Open a Can
customer_reviews.text: My hands tire easily, so I bought this to save my energy. Sometimes it has to go around the can twice to open it, but overall it is so easy an convenient. You just press the button and it does all the work. My mom was so impressed, I got her on for Christmas and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Willliams

customer_reviews.title: Great little can opener
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great little can opener. It gets only 4 stars because it can be a little stubborn at times to get it to open certain cans. We started using rechargeable batteries in it because normal batteries don't seem to last very long with it. I really love how it opens the can without a sharp edge.
customer_reviews.author: Dale & Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Best can opener
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it as it is a gift. However, if it works like the one I already own. it's fantastic. Put it on the can and start it - you can let it run while you multi-task in your kitchen. It will stop on it's own and you just remove it from the can and lift the lid of the can off and there are no sharp edges. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys L.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement item
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with this product. It came highly recommended by a close friend who absolutely loves this item. When we couldn't make it work, our friend came over to show us how simple it was to use. He couldn't even make it work. He inspected it and he thinks it's defictive. I know it's too late for a refund but I would love to get a replacement for it
customer_reviews.author: Connie Contreras Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement over electric can openers!
customer_reviews.text: At first, it was difficult to open top to insert batteries because the directions were a little misleading. But the can opener itself works great, can be stored in a drawer, and is a "boon" for people like me who are older and have arthritic hands. It virtually works itself! I'll get another one when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jar Opener Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver.....I also bought a jar opener that pops open lids, along with this beauty. I do not need to ask my son and husband to open jars and cans for me! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Noel Catura

customer_reviews.title: Used Tornado F4 can opener
customer_reviews.text: The electric can opener I purchased opens the cans okay, but does not stop once the can is open. I have to physically pull it off the can. Not at all helpful. I would not buy another used product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Laydydi

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: This product performed as advertised. Love the fact that you place it on the can push the button and presto the lid is removed. No sharp edges, just a clean open can.
customer_reviews.author: One Reezun

customer_reviews.title: The original Tornado was better.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this can opener at all. It got caught in the can and I had to pry it off the release it. It uses too many batteries and is clumsy to use. I'll go back to an electric can opener.
customer_reviews.author: JDZdesigns

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work very well
customer_reviews.text: So far we have used this opener on about 15 cans. It only opened one can completely. A couple of days ago my wife tried opening 4 tuna fish cans with no luck. I went over each can again several times but to open the cans I had to pry the lids off. Not very happy with this product. Note: on the can it did open the magnet did not remove the lid. As far as I am concern I spent money a a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Edward J frederick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for anyone with arthritis or literally anyone. Cuts nice and doesn’t leave a jagged edge, goes all the way around and has magnet to remove lid and prevent cuts
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Button got stuck a couple of times underneath the cover and the only way to turn it off was to open the battery compartment and pop a battery out so you can safely try to shift the button free. Still worthwhile if you just be thoughtful pushing the button down.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this model of the Tornado. the F4 is superior to the regular model.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: New and Improved is not  always that!
customer_reviews.text: I have the original Tornado can opener and I LOVE it! I purchased this for my elderly parents thinking it's going to be better as it said on the information about the product "New and improved". Well' in my opinion, it it NOT improved as It DID NOT WORK! Unfortunately, I didn't have the opportunity to use it after ordering it because I had it shipped to them. So lesson learned, if you buy something and you like ,it stick with that particular model as "new and improved" is not always better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a while
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a while. It was easy to use and easy to clean but then it just stopped working so I bought another one at a store and had the same issue it just stopped working I’m giving up them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Senior’s gift and anyone with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: My mom definitely loved this I’ve bought it for her because she can no longer turn a CanOpener this is a great gift for the senior population
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth savage

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works half the time, more difficult with small cans. Takes two tries usually to open those cans. Still better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Seekonk MA pet lover

customer_reviews.title: How t get it to engage.
customer_reviews.text: .Loved it once I got the knack of attaching it. While first workingd with it it opened a can so slick that I did not realize the lid was loose.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I had a little difficulty getting on the can. So, got the directions out and no problem. I and elderly and have arthritis in my hands and using the manual openers became difficult for me. Thanks for a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Boopsie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Can Opener
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is great for opening cans. Just a matter of why didn’t we get one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyMan

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the can opener in April. We are replacing it in June. I would have liked it to have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I ever got from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Has not worked right since I got it. Even tried 4 different batteries. I would return it but I do not have the receipt or packaging for it
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Make a can unmanageable
customer_reviews.text: When you cut the of the can off, you loose the strength of the steel at the top of the can.
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT smaller than the original. And it came in an open & taped together package.
customer_reviews.author: Justa Girl

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size stays on cans better. I really like the product but it could ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller size stays on cans better. I really like the product but it could use a sturdier case. Our house is built on a concrete slab ,so if you "butterfinger" this once, it's done for. Other than that it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Had the original for years until I dropped and broke it; loved it. The off center attachment if the newer model is often not connecting well. It’s much more difficult to easily start with my rheumatoid arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Love, love it. Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the opener so much I bought a second. No pug in so, when lights go out or camping is no problem to open cans.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jatsko

customer_reviews.title: junk by elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Worked about 4 times maybe 5 then just makes us sharp edge on the can to cut your finger on horrible product
customer_reviews.author: 1 Adam 12

customer_reviews.title: Had a different brand when they first came out several ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a different brand when they first came out several years ago. It finally quit after loyal service for years. This seems to be a cut above my old can opener,so far i'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but slow and weak power.
customer_reviews.text: Works to open most cans but sometimes gets stuck requiring repositioning and starting over. Very slow compared to a plug in type can opener. Seems to be a under powered tool, but it does eventually work on most cans.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMike

customer_reviews.title: Big cans yes
customer_reviews.text: So i bought this for large cans. It worked great. Can't figure how to use on small cans. Doesnt seem to work as well on them
customer_reviews.author: elena kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great can opener
customer_reviews.text: I love this can opener. Works great batteries last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Good but the magnet does not work
customer_reviews.text: Overrall it is okay, not as fast I thought, but the magnet does not work
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: A cut above the rest
customer_reviews.text: F4 Can Opener is really worth the money plus it works better than other brands I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Pappaw 73

customer_reviews.title: Works...partially.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to multitask in the kitchen - set it and go about other kitchen chores. Rather loud, but it does work. Magnet on the device doesn’t lift the lid off at all!
customer_reviews.author: TTacoma

customer_reviews.title: Hands-Free operation.  Virtually eliminates need for manual effort.
customer_reviews.text: Received product, undamaged, soon after I ordered it. Easy to use, hands-free in its operation, Works first time, every time. I received one last Xmas from a friend of mine. I liked it so much I am giving one to an 80+ year old relative who has trouble using manual can openers. Very happy with my purchase. D. Duncan
customer_reviews.author: Doug D.

customer_reviews.title: Not for big cans!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work on really big cans got stuke wouldn't come off and Brock! 😕

customer_reviews.title: Once it decides NOT to open a can, it will not open a can
customer_reviews.text: At first it was GREAT. Then when most needed it will not grab the can. Little or nothing I can do about it. It was used around 30 times, now it has problems. I bought it in July. I throw it away in October !!!
customer_reviews.author: Toms choice

customer_reviews.title: Works very poorly
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very bad upgrade from the previous model. Even after running around the can lid twice, the lid still has to be pried off. This upgrade is a bad design. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Duffin

customer_reviews.title: Fine on small cans not large ones
customer_reviews.text: Very good on regular size cans. I broke it trying to open a large can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a short time
customer_reviews.text: This can opener worked for a while but then didn't open cans. It would just go around and not open. Sometimes it would just fall off the can. Emailed and called Harvest Trading Company and got no response. Harvest Trading Company doesn't seem to back up the products they are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: had a problem with can opener
customer_reviews.text: again had a problem i dont want to give you a bad review what can you do should last longer the a yr will not cut in cans
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a month
customer_reviews.text: This can opener works great for about a month. This is our second one. The first one we bought in a retail store and bought the second one from Amazon. It stopped working 2 weeks after the return period. We like the concept of smooth edges, but it just doesn't seem to work beyond a few cans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One like Mom's
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and my kids wanted one so I ordered 2, 1 for each of them.
customer_reviews.author: DORA

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't open cans
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't open the cans! Worse can opener I ever bought!

customer_reviews.title: Will not cut can
customer_reviews.text: Tried everything will not cut cans. Will go around and around but never cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arthritis best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Opens all my cans!! I have very sore hands from arthritis and can not open a can without this wonderful invention!! How did I survive without it???
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I had a much more expensive one that didn't work at all, and this one is small, easy to store and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My old one died so got this new and improved one. Works great.m and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: The can opener reinvented.
customer_reviews.text: A different kind of opener! It cuts the rim in half, making a non-sharp edge on either surface. I’ve found this to be the easiest can opener to use, and I’ve tried a dozen or more. I’ll be buying another for my RV!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sam V

customer_reviews.title: Best Opener
customer_reviews.text: This is the best opener on the market it opens cans fast and with no sharp edge.
customer_reviews.author: diemaker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for a couple months, then it would go around the can and etch the side, but not open the can. Now, less than 5 months and it won't even start cutting. It has only been used on about 10-12 cans. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Planet42

customer_reviews.title: Tornado F4 is even better than my old version!
customer_reviews.text: This version not only opens cans (even ones with pull top lids) without sharp edges, it stops by itself. The only times it hasn't stopped is when the lid is bent or misshapen. I'm really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda from Tulelake

customer_reviews.title: MOVE ON
customer_reviews.text: Simply doesn't work as advertised. Do not waste your money or your time here. If this product had a rating at less than one star I would have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works to open can, but magnet does not pull off lid
customer_reviews.text: It does open the can easily, however, the magnet does not pull off the lid. This means I have to put something right under the cut to pop off the lid. I purchased this because my hands hurt, so this doesn't help my hands much.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Pesoli

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after the original one we had quit working after 1 year, and the second use the cutting wheel broke off. And now it sits waiting for the desicion to send back or pitch in trash and use hand crank one. Never mind I have made my mind up..NO MORE GADGETS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: One hand use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my wife who has difficulty with use of one of her hands. This helps her use with one hand and is quite easy for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anselmo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Can opener is too slow.
customer_reviews.text: The opener is very slow, hard to release from cans and turns on randomly in the drawer with nothing touching it. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shonna Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Great can opener for one hand use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Got for my pops who is mobility limited and can only use one hand. This is perfect. Beware, it does seem to eat through batteries!
customer_reviews.author: The Kukla’s

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 10 to15 cans, now it wont open a single can. It doesn't cut and keeps jumping off. Wasted money. Must be the new improved design.

customer_reviews.title: ... her the newer model and she loves it even better!!
customer_reviews.text: My Mother's old model broke - got her the newer model and she loves it even better!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the original Tornado and we love the auto-shutoff.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible opened 1 can and never worked again. Very disappointed

customer_reviews.text: This can opener cuts so low on the rim that you have to pry the lid off each time and I've even gotten cut trying to do this!

customer_reviews.title: I really didnt like it, it dont open the can like it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really didnt like it, it dont open the can like it should and if you finally keep at it till it does open, the magnet wont pick up the lid.

customer_reviews.title: opening cans
customer_reviews.text: can opener will not open cans reliably-suggest you discontinue this item-i did not return item - too much trouble-could be used as paper weight but not as a reliable can opener

customer_reviews.title: Tornado
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with a tornado. Have used other brands but find them to be inferior to the tornado. Good product. Change my review, stopped working only after 7 months of use.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mine is very slow n never re.oves the lid without help from my electric can opener. My sister has one and works very well

customer_reviews.text: Struggles to open can groans and stops . Has new batteries. Will change batteries to a different brand and try again.

customer_reviews.title: Great for carpel tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and helps a ton with my carpel tunnel.

customer_reviews.text: Works really good and is so easy to use too.

customer_reviews.text: I just bought one for my mom and dad !! They love it

customer_reviews.title: why this item does not open my cans
customer_reviews.text: it doesnt work on opening my cans.also you never responsed to my calls .Iwould like a new one and u can have this one back

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: To date this has opened all of 2 cans out of dozens. Sometimes it goes around twice to finally open a can, but most of the time it goes around once and either it will not open at all, or it is cut in segments. Also, it has NEVER used the magnet at all - that part just does not work. We have to simply use a manual can opener to complete the event. I do not see how this gets so many 5 and 4 stars. Unfortunately I have kept this to long to be able to return it - waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: GMC-Pdx

customer_reviews.title: Why are the items I order not what I expect to large, small, or don't work.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work had to go by a manual anyway.

customer_reviews.title: Ok!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome utensil
customer_reviews.text: It is a must for those of us with arthritic hands.

customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old F4 with this new one. I tried to use my last one on a can that was too small and bound it up.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts smooth and fast
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. Great opener. Easy to use and smooth cuts.

product_meta.title: Tornado F4 Can Opener - New and Improved - Safest, fastest, Easiest Hands-Free Can Opener (Red)
feature_bullets: Improved Hands-Free Operation, one-button start with automatic shut off after 1 rotation - Perfect for Arthritis Sufferers
Smaller version of the original Tornado Can Opener - FIts in the palm of your hand and is easier to store
Faster - The New Tornado F4 requires fewer batteries than the original and cuts the lid off cans faster
New Quick Release Button - this Tornado Can Opener will never get stuck on a can with this new feature
New Soft-Touch Ergonomic Design - compact size fits in your hand and makes for easier storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars367 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
